Interface com.chimu.kernel.collections.KeyedArray

public interface KeyedArray
extends Array, KeyedCollection
A KeyedArray combines the functionality of a KeyedCollection and an Array. It is an Array [non-extensible, updatable, indexed collection] which also associates a Key with each index entry.

atIndex_put(int, Object)
